lifestyle_news_search.description: Real-time updates, analysis, and personalized content from top sources like The Mix, Snipdaily, Nerdable, and Familyproof.

props.name: query
props.description: Enter a natural language query or URL

props.name: similarity_top_k
props.description: Number of articles to return (default is 9)

props.name: ref
props.description: Restrict results to a domain (e.g., familyproof.com)

props.name: num_articles_ref
props.description: Minimum number of articles to match the preferred domain

real_time_web_search.description: Access real-time Google web search results including the latest news, weather, travel, deals and more.

sports_news_search.description: Real-time news, updates, and personalized content from top sports sources like Sportsnaut, Forever Blueshirts, Minnesota Sports Fan, LAFB Network, Bounding Into Sports, and Ringside Intel.

props.name: query
props.description: Enter a natural language query or URL

props.name: similarity_top_k
props.description: Number of articles to return (default is 9)

props.name: ref
props.description: Restrict results to a domain (e.g., sportsnaut.com)

props.name: num_articles_ref
props.description: Minimum number of articles to match the preferred domain

stock_market_data_search.description: Access real-time financial news, stock prices, and trades from polygon.io, with AI-powered insights and up-to-the-minute updates to keep you informed on all your financial interests.
